query:
-- 查看张三的用户ID和授权记录
SELECT u.id as userId, u.username, sp.id as permissionId, sp.stockUserId, su.name as stockUserName
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN stockUserPermissions sp ON u.id = sp.userId
LEFT JOIN stockUsers su ON sp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE u.username = '张三';
